patterns: What are small business ideas that can be started by women in villages?
What kinds of business can be started in small town by women?
can you tell small business ideas with which we can start?
can you help with business ideas which can be started with low income by women
what are common business ideas for women in villages?
can you tell some common business ideas
can I know business ideas to start?
responses: Tailoring , Milk Centre or Daily Parlour , Poultry farming , Kirana Store , Vegetables & Fruits Vending Shop , Garments Store , bakery shop, tiffin business , beautician.

patterns: can I know about Buzz women?
what is Buzz women?
can you tell about Buzz-women
what is the initiative of Buzz women?
what help we get from buzz women
responses: Buzz Women is the global movement by and for women. We bring transformation within reach and enable women to ignite their personal and collective power.

patterns: Do buzz women help with cash or loan?
Does buzz women provide any cash for starting business?
Is any kind of financial help done by buzz women?
responses: Buzz women does not provide any cash or financial help , we will help you by mentoring you and provide enough knowledge so that you can take your decisions and start business.

patterns: How can I contact Buzzwomen?
How can I contact buzz-women
How can I contact buzz women
Is there a way through which I can contact buzz-women?
How can I connect with Buzz-women?
responses: you can send a mail to `ask@buzzwomen.org`

patterns: how can i get information of various business schemes
how can i know about schemes
how can schemes support my bussiness
different supporting schemes
government assistance for business
government business schemes
can you tell me any government scheme to support my business
responses: Here are some schemes provided by the government: Mudra Loan for Women, Annapurna Scheme, Stree Shakti Yojana, Dena Shakti Scheme

patterns: what is your name?
can i know your name
can you tell your name
responses: I am Buzz-women faqbot

patterns: how can i grow my business?
Is there any way to grow my business
can you tell how to grow my business
In what ways I can grow my business
Tips to grow my business
responses: Hire the right people , Focus on established revenue sources , Reduce your risks , Be adaptable , Focus on your customer experience ,Invest in yourself ,Always think ahead , Research your competitors.

patterns: How much investment is required to start a small business?
How much investment is required to start a small business for women
How much investment is required to start business for women in village
How much money is required to start a small business
Can I know initial capital required to start business?
Can I know initial money required to start smallbusiness?
responses: The amount of investment that a business requires depends on the type of business. And how much the small business owner can put in the business. Generally for a small business 50000 to 100000 is enough.

patterns: What things I should consider before starting a business?
what things I should see before starting a business
Common things that should be seen before starting a business
Things to keep in mind before starting business
responses: How can we bring to the consumer a unique product/service? , How can we bring this product/service to the consumer more economically? , How can we bring this product/service to the marketplace more conveniently?

patterns: Is it possible to get a business loan in villages or small towns?
How to get a business loan in villages
Can I  get business loan in village
How can I get a business loan
responses: Yes, you can apply for getting a business loan from any bank in your area.

patterns: what is the eligibility criteria of a small business loan?
Can I know eligibility criteria of a small business loan
Can you tell me eligibility criteria of a small business loan
what is eligibility criteria for business loan in village?
responses: Age: Minimum :- 21 yrs, Maximum :- 70 yrs , Nationality: Indian nationals , No case of default with any financial institutions , Bank statements for last 12 month , Income tax returns for the last two years

patterns: what is the eligibility criteria of a small business loan?

Can you tell me eligibility criteria of a small business loan
what is eligibility criteria for business loan in village?
responses: Age: Minimum :- 21 yrs, Maximum :- 70 yrs , Nationality: Indian nationals , No case of default with any financial institutions , Bank statements for last 12 month , Income tax returns for the last two years
